title: Karass: A Gathering of Souls
description: Is remote viewing dangerous?Mira Michaels has been on her own for a lifetime. But when the orphan practices her ability to extend her consciousness in search of a deeper connection, she gets much more than she bargained for.Mira desperately seeks help when something sinister begins tracking her every move.After contacting old friends to help her learn what she’s unleashed, Mira finds a home and family she thought she had lost. But realizing that she has power far beyond her imagination may not be enough to keep all of them safe.Can Mira hold on to her new family, or will the forces that don’t want them to discover their powers stop them before they can even begin?Karass sets the stage for The Karass Chronicles series of standalone stories about hidden mysteries, magical abilities, other dimensions, and the power of love.If you like thought-provoking fiction, spiritual awakenings, and otherworldly possibilities, then you’ll love Beca Lewis’s mind-bending opening to other worlds and dimensions.
author: Beca Lewis
